Class ECAMdeep

java.lang.Object
ECAMdeep
public class ECAMdeep extends Object
Exhaustively searches sets of all Wolfram codes of various lengths, with various parameters

  • Method Details

    • deepLogicSearch

      public String deepLogicSearch(int numFactors, int whichTable)
      Similar to deepECAsearch() except that it uses the 0-16 four bit logic gate truth table instead of the 0-255 ECA.

      Cross-references solutions to find which gates have solutions in common. Aggregates solution identiity information.

      Parameters:
      numFactors - number of factors to permute
      whichTable - which set of multiplication tables to use, @see whichMultTableNames
      Returns:
      a String of the output, used in SwingTextPanel

    • deepECASearch

      public String deepECASearch(int degree, int numRows, int numFactors, int whichMultTable)
      This function searches every 0-255 ECA rule with the given parameters for valid solutions and cross-references and displays the results, similar to deepLogicSearch() but focused on ECA rather than logic gate Wolfram codes

      Cross-references solutions to see which ECA have solutions in common. Checks all ECA solutions for identities and non-trivial identities ( a non-trivial identity is a multiplication result row that equals the identity, with a non-zero permutation set). Checks all ECA solutions for having repeat indices and non-repeat indices.

      Parameters:
      degree - degree hypercomplex, 2 = quaternions, 3 = octonions, etc.
      numRows - number of rows in the ECA analyze, 1 row is standard 3-bit input neighborhood, 2 rows is a 5-bit neighborhood, etc
      numFactors - number of factors to use in calculation
      whichMultTable - which multiplication table option
      Returns:
      a String of the output, used in SwingTextPanel
